atk-s0401a11:1_1: Ekādasame vagge adhammaṁ adhammotiādīni vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0401a11:4_1: Dvādasame pana anāpattiṁ āpattītiādīsu ‘‘anāpatti ajānantassa atheyyacittassa namaraṇādhippāyassa anullapanādhippāyassa namocanādhippāyassā’’ti tattha tattha vuttā anāpatti anāpatti nāma,
atk-s0401a11:4_2: ‘‘jānantassa theyyacittassā’’tiādinā nayena vuttā āpatti āpatti nāma,
atk-s0401a11:4_10: appaṭikammāpatti nāma anavasesāpattiyeva. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
